SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into address (userId, userName, telNum, cityinfo, addressInfo) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update address set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telNum = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telNum = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityinfo = #{cityinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userId, userName, telNum, cityinfo, addressInfo from address
